testcase.name: I want to book hotel
testcase.system-out: Given I live in London......................................................passed And I want to go on a holiday...............................................passed And We are 3 adults.........................................................passed And We want to book from 10th Feb 2019 to 20th Feb 2019.....................passed When I go to travel agent...................................................passed Then He should be able to help me in a budget of 1000 USD...................passed And He should provide me option to cancel...................................passed But He should not ask for advance more than 300 USD.........................passed
